title: ICE fictitious type O in sizing_type_of()

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
on Linux x86 with rustc 0.12.0-pre (38eb0e551 2014-09-06 21:46:25 +0000)
trying to compile [this code](https://github.com/bacchus123/rust_parse/commit/21cbdd418d6e71e0c6a3f28bc88d6f4dec115b6d)
recieved this output : 

```
    error: internal compiler error: fictitious type O in sizing_type_of()
    task 'rustc' failed at 'Box<Any>', /home/nate/builds/rust/src/libsyntax/ast_util.rs:776
```

with trace

